name: Bharat City Ghaziabad
short_description: Bharat City is a township launching by the joint venture of the BCC and HDFC PMS. Bharat City has a gated community with strong boundary wall. Bharat City joint venture of BCC and HDFC PMS is spread over 50 acres of prime location land of Ghaziabad. Bharat City is one of the best upcoming Township of Ghaziabad. This is one of the largest residential project at Indraprastha Yojna, Ghaziabad. It offers 5000 units with multiple options in sizes an dlayouts to revel in the pure of joy of living.
summary: 2BHK and 3BHK Flats in BCC Bharat City Ghaziabad.
